apple_vendor_description: The man in a steamy room emoji, rendered with a dark skin tone on Apple devices, showcases a serene and relaxed individual.  Visible wisps of steam gently curl around the figure, illuminated by soft, realistic lighting that emphasizes the calming atmosphere unique to Apple's detailed design.  On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully captures the feeling of rejuvenation, self-care, and unwinding in a tranquil environment.
